body.name: Life drawing
body.caption: Flyers and posters I designed for the men-only life drawing sessions I organise. The sessions started out in London's last-remaining leather bar before moving to a hair salon in Dalston.

body.name: Arthouse Unlimited
body.caption: Arthouse Unlimited is an art-based charity working with neurodiverse adults, some of whom have further physical disabilities. I worked there both as an art instructor and packaging designer/artworker.

body.name: Jubilee Park
body.caption: These illustrations, based on aspects of Jubilee Park in Leyton, London, were sand-blasted onto cement blocks, paired with taller information pillars and positioned around the park to mark out a new woodland walk.

body.name: Waltham Forest
body.caption: Further illustrations for two print projects in Waltham Forest, London. The first was a map of a local stream, the second a booklet about Jubilee Park.

body.name: Books 2

designs.name: Life drawing
designs.caption: Flyers and posters I designed for the men-only life drawing sessions I organise. The sessions started out in London's last-remaining leather bar before moving to a hair salon in Dalston.

designs.name: Arthouse Unlimited
designs.caption: Arthouse Unlimited is an art-based charity working with neurodiverse adults, some of whom have further physical disabilities. I worked there both as an art instructor and packaging designer/artworker.

designs.name: Jubilee Park
designs.caption: These illustrations, based on aspects of Jubilee Park in Leyton, London, were sand-blasted onto cement blocks, paired with taller information pillars and positioned around the park to mark out a new woodland walk.

designs.name: Waltham Forest
designs.caption: Further illustrations for two print projects in Waltham Forest, London. The first was a map of a local stream, the second a booklet about Jubilee Park.

designs.name: Books 1
designs.caption: Spreads from the six books I wrote and illustrated.

designs.name: Books 2
designs.caption: Terror: A Consideration - a 64-page book I wrote and designed about the uses and abuses of terror;   Run and Become - a 140-page book I designed and edited as part of a University of Sussex project examining why people run marathons.

designs.name: Books 3
designs.caption: A selection from some of the 25+ books I've illustrated.

designs.name: Dissertation
designs.caption: Compendiu, my 2011 dissertation, was set in a fictional arts centre dedicated to the promotion of unfinished artwork in all its forms.
